plot: Bert, a crane driver in the London docks, is persuaded to listen to a radio programme about the Co-operative movement by his wife May. He is roused to lead his workmates to march in a May Day workers' demonstration.
title: Advance Democracy!
plot_es: Bert, a crane driver in the London docks, is persuaded to listen to a radio programme about the Co-operative movement by his wife May. He is roused to lead his workmates to march in a May Day workers' demonstration.
plot_en: Bert, a crane driver in the London docks, is persuaded to listen to a radio programme about the Co-operative movement by his wife May. He is roused to lead his workmates to march in a May Day workers' demonstration.
